dialogues.text: They believe the innocent are guilty and the guilty are innocent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After shooting Styles, Osborne gives her story to the M.P HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if they're asked, that's what they'll tell the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Osborne, watching the taped West. WEST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your greatest weapon will by your allies . . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hardy, taking a cigarette from Dunbar's pack. HARDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My brand.   Must be my lucky day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kendall, coughing fit.   Hardy, getting him a GLASS OF WA WEST (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: . . . some of which you may have to sacrifice for the greater good. Hardy, secretly dissolving a POWDER into Kendall's water. HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got the toxicology report . . .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hardy, confronting Styles in the dark. WEST (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make no mistake, the innocent will die. . . Osborne, FIRING TWICE into Styles.   As he hits the wall

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next time you frame a guy, pick someone who can't defend themselves... But it will not be in vain. Sometimes, you can trick the enemy into doing your work for you. . . Osborne, staring down at WEST'S PISTOL. HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He still carry those guns?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earlier.   Alone, Hardy plants West's pistol in Styles' d WEST (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...if you engage in a clever enough subterfuge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hardy stands behind Kendall and Dunbar, overseeing them a they fill out requisition forms. Kendall signs West's signature, Dunbar signs Styles'. HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What I can't understand is why you signed these... As we move into a CLOSE UP on Hardy: OSBORNE (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never told me why you got kicked out of... STYLES (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The army kicked you out for drugs... MUELLER AND DUNBAR (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got a friend with an in at the PX, can hook you up... STYLES (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's only one criminal standing in this room and it's you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Osborne, watching the tape of West's speech. WEST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which brings us to the simple goal. For the true warrior, the one and only objective is to emerge from conflict unscathed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GTO pulls into a space and Hardy and Dunbar get out. HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I promised them I'd ask you where West and the others are... DUNBAR (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Washout rejects, guys he said were "dumbfucks too stupid to know they dead"... HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's telling the truth up to a point... They walk towards the bar's entrance. HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't prove anything until we find the bodies... PIKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All we gotta do is tell the story right... DUNBAR (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You haven't found any bodies yet, have you... As Hardy and Dunbar push through the doors into the bar.. HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A table of FOUR MEN look up as Hardy and Dunbar enter. Mueller, Childs, Pike, and the Motor Pool DUTY SERGEANT. All drinking beer, having a grand old time. STYLES (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Habeas Corpus - you have to have a body to have a crime. Hardy and Dunbar smile and go to join them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the taped West concludes his speech. WEST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The screen cuts to STATIC. Osborne turns off the TV, extinguishing the last source of light. OVER THE DARKNESS WEST (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can tell a story, can't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence.   We slowly move towards Hardy's parked GTO... HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Murder is basic. Focusing on the TRUNK... HARDY (V.O.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are no conspiracies, no grand mysteries, no evil puppet masters behind it all, pulling the strings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WEST'S BODY, stuffed into the trunk of Hardy's car. HARDY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone's capable of murder, Osborne.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dunbar lays the wounded Kendall down as the Helicopter carrying Styles comes in for a landing. Dunbar wipes the sweat from Kendall's brow and asks him seriously: DUNBAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you ready for this?
